response:
"wir sollten unsere personenbezogenen informationen besser schützen. datenschutz ist nicht nur ein recht, sondern eine verantwortung. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "we should protect our personal information better. data privacy is not just a right, but a responsibility. #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post emphasizes the importance of protecting personal information in the context of data privacy. it suggests that individuals have a responsibility to safeguard their own data and that it is not solely a matter of rights, but also a matter of security. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics on twitter.
